sourcesContent:
<main>
  <app-user 
    *ngFor = "let user of users | filterByChar:charFilter"
    [name] = "user.name"
    [status] = "user.status"
    [url] = "user.url">
    >   
  </app-user>
</main>

<select [(ngModel)]="charFilter">
  <option value="">All</option>
  <option *ngFor="let user of users" [value]="user.name.charAt(0)">{{user.name.charAt(0)}}</option>
</select>
